genesis.system.jdbc.driver.description: JDBC driver class name to use for access to the application database

genesis.system.jdbc.username.description: User name for access to the application database

genesis.system.jdbc.password.description: Password for access to the application database

genesis.system.jdbc.drop.db.description: Recreate DB schema even if the schema already exists. Possible values: true, false

genesis.system.connectionPool.maxIdle.description: The cap on the number of "sleeping" instances in the pool

genesis.system.connectionPool.minIdle.description: The minimum number of "sleeping" instances in the pool before before the evictor thread (if active) spawns new objects

genesis.system.connectionPool.maxActive.description: The cap on the total number of active instances from the pool

genesis.system.shutdown.timeout.sec.description: Time to wait for graceful workflows termination in seconds. 0 - do not shutdown until everything canceled.

genesis.system.default.vm.identity.description: Default login to virtual machines provisioned by Genesis

genesis.system.default.vm.credential.description: Path to default credential file (PEM RSA private key file for ssh) to login to virtual machines provisioned by Genesis

genesis.system.agent.poll.period.description: Agents health check period in secs

genesis.system.remote.executor.wait.time.description: Timeout (in seconds) to wait for remote actor returned by agent

genesis.system.beat.period.ms.description: Workflow execution actors heartbeats period in milliseconds

genesis.system.flow.executor.sync.thread.description: Maximum number of simultaneously executing synchronous actions

genesis.system.metrics.description: Gathering of system metrics: on if true, off otherwise

genesis.system.databag.template.reposito.description: Filesystem path to databag templates folder
